message_1:
Consider a transposition cipher that shuffles the letters of the plaintext message by using a keyword. In this cipher, the plaintext message "MATHEMATICS IS FUN" is encrypted using the keyword "CIPHER" to produce the following ciphertext message:

"CIMEASFNUHTMTISA"

What is the length of the keyword used in this transposition cipher?
message_2: The keyword used in this transposition cipher is "CIPHER". The length of the keyword is 6.
